title: Principles of ultrasonics
creator_credit: Jack Chambers and Data Film Productions
brief_description: Indicates the relation and range of sonic and ultrasonic waves. Also shows how ultrasonic waves are detected and the various types of wave generator used to propagate them; their properties and the uses to which they can be put.
description: Indicates the relation and range of sonic and ultrasonic waves. Also shows how ultrasonic waves are detected and the various types of wave generator used to propagate them; their properties and the uses to which they can be put.
